paragraphs: I’m Muen Yu, currently I live in Brisbane seeking for a full-stack software engineer position. I used to work at a start-up game company [SAGI GAMES](https://sagigames.cn) as a backend engineer, responsible for game server & interior system development and cloud infrastructure. If you’re interested in the tools and software I use check out my [uses page](/uses).
In my spare time I like to write blog posts, develop & deploy automation in my homelab, watch Esport match and play video games.
